alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 11:23AM EDT until April 15 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston and from Edwardsport to Petersburg. Wabash River at Hutsonville, Riverton, and Mount Carmel. .Lowland, minor flooding continues along lower portions of the Wabash and White Rivers, as well as Seymour on the East Fork White. With dry weather expected for several days, minor flooding is expected to end over the weekend for most locations, but continue into the middle of next week at Mount Carmel, and near the end of next week at Hazleton. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY, APRIL 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Hazleton. * WHEN...Until Saturday, April 15. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, In agricultural season, extensive flooding of bottomlands and some of the higher bottomlands is in progress. High water surrounds residents in river cabins. Oil fields and local roads flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will rise to 21.0 feet this evening. It will then fall early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 21.3 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
